summary.overview: The application is a text-moving tool that allows users to input text into a textarea and move it to a display area on the right by clicking a button. It provides visual feedback on the progress of the text movement through a progress indicator and a progress bar.
summary.predefined_options: The application does not specify predefined options or default values for user inputs.
summary.external_resources: No external resources such as links, images, or audio files are used in this application.
summary.external_js_libraries: No external JavaScript libraries or packages are used in this application.

requirements.description: When the user enters text into the textarea (id='text') and clicks the button (id='button'), the system should move the text to the content display area (id='content') on the right.

If the user clicks the button (id='button') without entering any text in the textarea (id='text'), the system should display an alert message prompting the user to '请输入文本信息' (Please enter text information).

As the text is moved from the textarea (id='text') to the content display area (id='content'), the system should update the progress indicator (strong element) to reflect the number of characters moved versus the total number of characters.
When the button (id='button') is clicked, the system should change the button's background color to '#ccc' to indicate activation.
Upon clicking the button (id='button'), the system should display the progress bar (ul element) and update its items (li elements) to visually represent the progress of the text movement.
The system should clear the content display area (id='content') each time the button (id='button') is clicked to ensure only the current text is displayed.
